name: Comparative study of the organismic assemblages associated with the demosponge Sarcotragus foetidus Schmidt, 1862 in the coasts of Cyprus and Greece
description: This dataset includes species found in the demospongeSarcotragus foetidus. The sponges were collected form two stations, in depths between 5 and 17 meters. The stations were located in Linaraki (Sithonia, Halkidiki, Greece) and in Milourgia(Kissonerga, Pafos, Cyprus). Sampling in Cyprus was conducted in January of 2003 andAugust of 2003 and 2007, in depths between 5 and 10 meters. Sampling in Greece was conducted in February and July of 2003, in depthsbetween 14 and 17 meters.
